thread.title: Win Inside My Radio for Xbox One plus merchandise
thread.title_full: Win Inside My Radio for Xbox One plus merchandise

author: Greg Ellwood
title: Win Inside My Radio for Xbox One plus merchandise
text:
Posted on October 4, 2015 By Greg Ellwood Competitions 
To celebrate the recent release of Inside My Radio on Xbox One we’ve teamed up with our friends at Iceberg Interactive . We’re giving away Inside My Radio prize bundles to two lucky EF readers. 
Here’s the official description of the game: 
Journey as a green LED mysteriously trapped inside a dying boombox and play the ultimate musical experience. In this thumping, rhythmic platform adventure where your every action needs to be right on the beat, bring electro, dub and disco music back to life! 
Two lucky winners will each take home: An Xbox One digital code for Inside My Radio A custom Inside My Radio Boombox An Inside My Radio T-Shirt < > 
To be in with a chance of winning an Inside My Radio prize bundle, simply answer the question and complete the form below. 
The competition closes at 23.59 (GMT) on October 15th 2015. The lucky winners will be contacted shortly after via email to claim their prizes. 
*You can enter once per day to increase your chances of winning but please note, only one entry per day will be counted* If you are human, leave this field blank. Win Inside My Radio for Xbox One plus merchandise What score did we award Inside My Radio in our review? 5/10
